text: Hesham Mesbah (, born March 17, 1982) is an Egyptian judoka. He won a bronze medal in the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, Egypt's first judo medal in 24 years. Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic medalists for Egypt Category:Judoka Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Olympics
title: Hesham Mesbah
